oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of dietary fiber and distillers grains on fecal shedding of enterohemorrhagic Escherichia coli in feedlot steers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schneider, L. G.
Erickson, G. E.
Moxley, R. A.
Smith, D. R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: distillers grain
diet
nutrition
neutral detergent fiber
shedding
enterohemorrhagic Escherichia coli
E. coli
feedlot steers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to determine whether the presence of distillers grain (DGS) in the diet or the level of neutral detergent fiber (NDF) affects shedding of enterohemorrhagic Escherichia coli (EHEC) in feedlot steers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2016; 170
